home.title: Home
home.slogan: where we boost your potential reframe your career and unite professionals for unparalleled opportunities in the job market
home.dreamJob: Choose the job of your dreams with
home.whoIs: Who is Job for You designed for?
designedFor: For those on the lookout for courses
home.whyChoose: Why choose Job for You for your job search?

whyChooseSlider.title: Personalized job search
whyChooseSlider.description: Forget endless job listings! With Job for You, your job search becomes personal. Specify your unique skills, and we'll present only those jobs that truly match your profile

whyChooseSlider.title: Professional profile
whyChooseSlider.description: Craft an impressive profile that stands out among other candidates. Job for You helps you showcase your uniqueness and capture the attention of potential employers.

whyChooseSlider.title: Active community
whyChooseSlider.description: Join our dynamic community of professionals, discuss crucial topics, and exchange experiences. Together, we grow and thrive!

whyChooseSlider.title: Educational resources
whyChooseSlider.description: Our educational resources section helps you keep your skills up-to-date. Stay in the loop with Job for You and remain on the cutting edge.

whyChooseSlider.title: Announcements and recruitment events
whyChooseSlider.description: Never miss important recruitment events and job announcements. With Job for You, fresh and promising opportunities are always within your reach.

whyChooseSlider.title: Resume creation tools
whyChooseSlider.description: Forget the complexity of resume creation. With our integrated editor, you'll easily craft a professional document that grabs the attention of employers.

whyChooseSlider.title: Notifications and updates
whyChooseSlider.description: Receive notifications about new job opportunities and changes in your resume status. Stay in control of your career development with Job for You.

whyChooseSlider.title: Direct employer contact
whyChooseSlider.description: With Job for You, you not only find a job but also establish direct contact with potential employers. Start conversations and build the future of your career right now!

home.explore: Explore remote positions and international opportunities with us, connecting skilled individuals with the world during challenging times. Your career journey continues, regardless of borders, with our support.

card1.title: Sign Up
card1.description: Join Job for You by registering through the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner of the screen or the 'Get started' button in the top of the screen. Additionally, we've prepared a step-by-step guide to make the registration process smoother for you.

card2.title: Complete profile
card2.description: To enhance your profile, upload your CV or resume. Alternatively, manually input your education, work experience, and skills directly into your profile. For guidance on providing accurate information, check out our tutorial crafted to assist you in presenting your qualifications effectively.

card3.title: Land your dream job
card3.description: Explore our Jobs section to discover opportunities tailored to your experience and education. Our platform uses the details you provide to match you with suitable job options. Submit applications and secure your next career move!

profile.visibleForMe: This section is only visible to you
profile.defaultText: Here your self-description will be displayed...

image.wrongWidthError: Background width must be at least {{value}}px!
image.description: At Job for You, we embrace your authenticity! Take a photo or upload an existing one to make your profile as realistic as possible. We support your unique presentation, without editing or filters – here, it's all about you!
image.mobileDescription: Upload a photo to make your profile as real as possible. We support your unique representation, without editing or filters - it's all about you here!

general.title: general information
general.description: On Job for You, you can share your years of experience, choose your industry and specify your skills. Describe your accomplishments and previous work experience to create a complete picture of your career
general.skillsDescription: Show your strengths - add up to 5 key skills that you would like to be recognized for. They will automatically appear in your "Skills" section on Job for You

profileStatus.description: Level up your Job For You experience by filling in all your details and find the perfect job for you

one.title: Where do you currently work?

two.description: By specifying your field of work, you have a chance to get 2.5 times more views of your profile

four.description: Highlight your key competencies and unique abilities, catching the attention of potential employers

publicProfile.title: Profile visibility settings
publicProfile.description: You have full control over your profile and can set restrictions on the display of your information in search engines and other services. Users without an account can only see a limited part of your profile

content.title: Edit profile content
content.description: To edit sections, go to Personal Profile

visibility.title: Edit profile visibility
visibility.description: You have complete control over the appearance of your profile for those who do not have an account on our site. The restrictions you set here affect how your information appears in search engines

main.title: Home
main.noPostsDescription: Seems like you don't have any news yet. Share your thoughts, ideas, and news with your connections

page1.title: Page Access Management
page1.description: Control who manages your page here.

adminStatuses.label: Chief editor
adminStatuses.description: this status allows you to manage everything on the page

adminStatuses.label: Content editor
adminStatuses.description: this status allows you to post and manage content, comments on behalf of the page, and reply to messages

page1.deleteAction: Do you want to delete administrator {{ name }}?

page2.title: Page Visibility Settings
page2.description: Configure restrictions on how your page information is displayed in search engines and other services, as well as content visibility for non-subscribers.
page2.visibilityDescription: Permit users who are not subscribed to your page to view company content

page3.title: Page Deactivation
page3.deactivateDescription: Deactivation will result in the complete deletion of the page from Job For You. After deactivation, you and other administrators will no longer have access to the page.
page3.terms: By clicking 'Deactivate', I confirm that I understand the consequences of deactivating the page.
page3.error: An error occurred while deactivating the page

workSetup.description: Specify the type of employment in the workplace and attract the most suitable candidates
